name: uc-03-data-lineage
title: Data Lineage with Unity Catalog
description: Discover data lineage with Unity Catalog: table to table and column to column
fullDescription:
Unity Catalog is a unified governance solution for all data and AI assets including files, tables, machine learning models and dashboards in your lakehouse on any cloud.
In this demo, we'll show how Unity Catalog provides Lineage on any data that you read & write.
Not only Unity Catalog provides lineage at a table level, but also at a row level, allowing you to track which application is using which data, ideal for PII/GDPR data analysis and governance.
